sections.heading: 01|Workers' compensation definitions
sections.text: Effective:September 23, 2022Latest Legislation:House Bill 447 - 134th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in this chapter:(A)(1) "Employee" means:(a) Every person in the service of the state, or of any county, municipal corporation, township, or

sections.heading: 754, inclusive, of the Revised Code shall be construed to extend the right of service of process upon nonresidents and upon residents who subsequently become nonresidents or who conceal their whereabouts or, after due diligence, whose whereabouts cannot be ascertained and no forwarding address can b
sections.text: 754, inclusive, of the Revised Code shall be construed to extend the right of service of process upon nonresidents and upon residents who subsequently become nonresidents or who conceal their whereabouts or, after due diligence, whose whereabouts cannot be ascertained and no forwarding address can be found, and shall not be construed as limiting any provisions for the service or process now or hereafter existing.

sections.heading: 94, inclusive, of the Revised Code shall be liberally construed in favor of employees and the dependents of deceased employees.
sections.text: 94, inclusive, of the Revised Code shall be liberally construed in favor of employees and the dependents of deceased employees.
